m_szDocTitle: SPX CEO Discusses Q3 2010 Results - Earnings Call Transcript | Seeking Alpha
m_szDocSumamry: SPX CEO Discusses Q3 2010 Results - Earnings Call Transcript Nov.  3, 2010  1:33 PM ET | SPX Corporation ( SPW ) Q3 2010 Earnings Call November  3, 2010  8:30 AM ET Executives Ryan Taylor - Director of Investor Relations Chris Kearney - Chairman, President and CEO Patrick O'Leary - Chief Financial Officer Analysts Nigel Coe - Deutsche Bank Securities John Inch - BofA Merrill Lynch Jeff Sprague – Vertical Research Finance Deane Dray – Citi Investments Operator Good day ladies and gentleman.  And welcome to the third quarter 2010 SPX Earnings Conference Call.  My name is Alicia and I will be you
